com.petpet.c3po.utils
Class DataHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.petpet.c3po.utils.DataHelper

public final class DataHelper
extends Object

The data helper class offers some data manipulation methods.

Author:
Petar Petrov

init

public static void init()
Loads the types of known properties into the TYPES Properties object.

getPropertyType

public static String getPropertyType(String key)
Gets the type of the property defined by the given key. If it is not found, STRING is returned.

Parameters:
key - the key to look for.
Returns:
the type of the property.

removeTrailingZero

public static String removeTrailingZero(String str)
Removes a trailing zero (.0) from a string.

Parameters:
str - the string to chop.
Returns:
the string without the trailing .0.

mergeMetadataRecord

public static void mergeMetadataRecord(Element e,
                                       MetadataRecord mr)
Merges the given metadata record within the given element. If a value for this record already exists, then a proper merge is done, where Conflicts are set if necessary.

Parameters:
e - the element to use for merging.
mr - the record to merge.

getTypedValue

public static Object getTypedValue(String t,
                                   String value)
Tries to infer the type of the value based on the property type and converts the value. Otherwise it leaves the string representation. This is valuable as the underlying persistence layer can store the native type instead of strings which makes some aggregation functions easier.

Parameters:
t - the type of the property @see PropertyType
value - the value to convert
Returns:
an object with the specific type, or the original value. If the passed value was null, an empty string is returned.
